Blog.post: England out of competition, ah bugger. no boots as yet, ah bugger (monday hopefully, if not monday then hopefully tuesday). not much really happened this week - hence the lack of updates. san andreas looking very good, cant wait till october.
was there ever any doubt that we'd lose 2nite? lets just see how far we get now.
i meant to include this pic with the review but forgot.

Last night the chilis played at Hyde park in London. The gig was also played on Radio 1 with Zane Lowe presenting an interview and the gig. What can I say, the chilis rocked to the extreme, they played all the classics and the crowd were singing along, so was i as i surfed the net. right martins a fuckin cretin, i insult his momma and he hits me with a wooden ruler dammit, wheres my holepunch when i need it? also martin stinx,he stank out my room with a homemade brew of lamb curry - bastard. back to the chilis, they rocked - what more can be said or expected from the legends that are the chilis. peace out peeps.
http://www.joecartoon.com/pages/donkeybong/ im still wondering what its all about, its very violent and pretty funny - the normal type of thing you can expect from joecartoon.

i cud be gettin a job at KFC quite soon. The boots cud be coming my way sooner than i thought. Lets see what else is happnin? Im listenin to the Chilis gig on radio 1 - shud be interesting, ill probably write a short review when its finished, peace out peeps.
These are the boots I kepp goin on about.

never seen so much crud in 1 place, its the same thing everyyear - but i s'pose gettin to watch those girls in short dresses is quite nice lol. Not much else has happened today, wonder how pissed people got last nite?

lets see it started with me and mart getting there at bout 6:45 when we ate food. Then we watched a bit of Faces of Death - which was Darrens idea- until we realised that this was not fun and hence not a party. So we then listened to music for a while b4 people began to play drinkin games and gettin pissed - esp Darren. There was a lot of homosexuality goin on between cameron martin and a very frightened darren. darren was also in shock of hearing the, now infamous, condom conversation first heard at Download, and imagining martin and claire *cough**coughing*.>_> I feel kinda sorry for darren - he stayed over the night, i wonder where he ended up sleeping. Carnival 2day, joy. Got £11 now, 1/4 of the way to gettin these boots that ive seen in a catologue.

This is a bit random as Im just working out how to add pics and then ill od a proper post. Lets see more random crap, going to Duncans BBQ l8r (thats gonna be random - will tell about it 2moro), carnival in Grantham 2moro - probably gonna be as good as usual, ie not. Peace peeps.

Today I finally got something Ive been trying to get for at least a year. A set of 3 Samurai Swords and they're in my favourite colour - black, btw mention this site to all your friends - invite them into my twisted mind.

My name is Sacullien, welcome to my realm. Here you will find information about my lifestyle and hobbies, please post - I will try to reply. This site will probably contain, if I can be bothered, things on Slipknot, Metallica and other bands I enjoy listening to - also Ill include things about Cowboy Bebop, Outlaw Star,computer/video games and trading card games (like Yu-Gi-Oh and Magic the Gathering)
Got £20 yesterday from Dad - spent it today on 3 games. they are Diablo II: Lord of Destruction, X-Men 2- Wolverines Revenge and finally Command and Conquer Red Alert 2. All for £20.
What was the point? First match Greece vs Portugal with Greece winning. Last match Greece vs Portugal with Greece winning. Why did we bother?
happy new month to all of you.
